vocabInfos.lsjDefs: cherished by Zeus , of kings and nobles, [8th/7th c.BC] (Middle Liddel)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 3Jn.1.9
§ Diotrephes, "nurtured by Zeus"
Diotrephes, (Proper name), 3Jn. 9*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
丟特腓 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "朱庇特神所滋養的"
約翰書信提到的一名好炫耀的信徒 ( 約參1:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
丢特腓 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "朱庇特神所滋养的"
约翰书信提到的一名好炫耀的信徒 ( 约参1:9)
